content.modules: The following module(s) may need to migrate data:
content.wait: If the system is migrating its own data, please wait before starting

summary.title: Migration Summary
summary.nothing: No document needed to be migrated.

error.actors: An error occured while migrating data for world actors.
error.token: An error occured while migrating data for the token actor {uuid}.
error.users: An error occured while migrating data for users.

droppeth.name: Droppeth Modifier
droppeth.hint: Key held when dropping an item on the ground.

manage.name: Manage Condition
manage.hint: Key held when dropping a condition to manage its duration.

withContent.name: With Container Content
withContent.hint: When a container is moved from one actor to another, should its content go with it.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Adds a way to link a macro to actions and spells. Drag & drop the macro in the details tab of the action/spell sheet.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Should your world use the Automatic Rune Progression Variant? This is incompatible with the regular ABP variant and will disable the system's variant setting.

force.name: Force Update
force.hint: When enabled, the runes will always be updated based on actor level. When disabled only the runes that are currently at a lower value than what they should be for that level will be upgraded.

remove.name: Remove-Effect Shortcut
remove.hint: Using [Shift + Right Click] on effect icons in the effects-panel will instantly remove all their charges/counters/badges.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Should your world allow your players actors to be able to give inventory items to other player-owned actors.

message.name: Send Message to Chat
message.hint: When an item is given to another actor, a chat message will be generated.

effect.name: Include Effects/Conditions
effect.hint: Should players also be able to drop effects & conditions onto actors they do not own.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Allow users to drop items on the canvas by holding the [Ctrl] key.

removeOnEmpty.name: Remove on Empty
removeOnEmpty.hint: Should the token & actor be removed when there are no more items.

light.name: Light Source
light.hint: Should the dropped item emit light. It will only be the case if a single item is present in the loot actor.

message.name: Send Message to Chat
message.hint: When items are dropped from an actor, a chat message will be generated.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Should your world use the Hero Point Deck actions.

table.name: Table UUID
table.hint: Unique identifier of the table you want to use in your world. To get the UUID of a table (in a compendium or in the Rollable Tables directory), simply open the table and Left-Click on ðŸ“” next to its name.

trade.name: Allow Trade
trade.hint: When enabled, characters will be able to trade actions with one another.

private.name: Private Draw
private.hint: When enabled, the chat message generated will be private to other players.

count.name: Hero Set Variant
count.hint: If 0, characters can only have one hero action per hero point. Otherwise, the number of hero actions will be dissociated from the number of hero points available and characters will redraw hero actions in set.

dropped.name: No Dropped Bulk
dropped.hint: Dropped equipment in an actor's inventory won't be accounted for bulk value calculation.

coins.name: Weightless Coins
coins.hint: Coins are weightless in the inventory.

create.name: On Item Creation
create.hint: Automatically set the un-identifed image of items to be the same as the regular image when the item is created/imported.

update.name: On Item Update
update.hint: Automatically update the un-identifed image when the item's regular image is updated.

force.name: Force De-targeting
force.hint: Will forcibly remove the targets of all users at turn/round change.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Will remove all your targets at turn/round change. This can be overridden by the 'Force De-targeting' world setting.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: When placing a template on the board, a new dialog will show up allowing you to target all the tokens inside it.

dismiss.name: Auto Dismiss
dismiss.hint: The template will be removed from the board after setting all the targets (or if cancelled). Orphan refers to templates that do not originate from a spell chat message.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Offers the ability to toggle between the regular and an alternate version of the character sheet's spellcasting tab at any moment by clicking once more on the tab icon.

sort.name: Sort by Category
sort.hint: When enabled, spells in a same rank table will first be sorted by category and then alphabetically.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Add toggles in the character sheet to change your stance with ease. It will also remove stances at the end of an encounter.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Actors will be able to link/share their data with one another.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Enabled the 'Target Helper' feature in your world.

addTargets.name: Add Targets to Messages
addTargets.hint: Will add extra targets to chat messages where damage can be applied and saves can be rolled.

smallButtons.name: Small Buttons
smallButtons.hint: Reduce the size of damage buttons for the extra targets.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: A new icon is added to damage messages allowing them to be merged with other damage messages.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Will hide the damage chat messages value of non-player owned creatures from players.

consumables.name: Add To Consumables
consumables.hint: Will add an extra 'use' button to consumables.

selfApplied.name: Auto Self-Applied
selfApplied.hint: The use button for self-applied effect will automatically apply the effect.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Add custom functionalities to the default system merchant.

servicesTop.name: Services Above Items
servicesTop.hint: Should services be displayed above the items list in the sheet.

buyMax.name: Buy Max Ratio
buyMax.hint: The maximum ratio value for buy filters.

sellMax.name: Sell Max Ratio
sellMax.hint: The maximum ratio value for sell filters.

servicesMax.name: Service Max Ratio
servicesMax.hint: The maximum ratio value for services.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Will allow tokens with negative elevation to remain visible on the board.

mode.name: Applied Filter
mode.hint: Which type of filter should be applied to tokens with an elevation below 0.

contrast.name: Contrast
contrast.hint: Contrast value when the token has a negative elevation.

alpha.name: Opacity
alpha.hint: Opacity value when the token has a negative elevation.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Will help you manage unidentified items in your world and keep track of which items are identified.

stash.name: Add Party Stash
stash.hint: Should the items in the party stash be added to the list to identify.

delay.name: 24 Hours Delay
delay.hint: When enabled, a character will need to wait 24h after failling to identify an item before being able to make another attempt. Otherwise it will be reset on the next day date.

playerRequest.name: Allow Player Request
playerRequest.hint: Should players be able to request identification of items.

identifyPartials.name: Auto Identify Similar Items
identifyPartials.hint: Should 'similar' items also be identified when using the 'Automatically identify known items' option.

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.hint: Let you turn a regular condition into an effet+condition combo with duration.

tool.noGM: There is no GM connected to your world, this operation cannot be processed.

error.unknown: An error occured while trying to transfer the container.

arp.forceVariant: The module PF2e Toolbelt disabled the pf2e system variant ABP rule to work properly. It would probably be better if you reloaded the world now.

error.zero: You cannot give an item you don't have yourself.
error.unknown: Something went wrong when trying to give the selected item(s).

dialog.title: Giveth Item
dialog.prompt: How many items do you wish to giveth?

content.container: {source} giveth {item} and all its content to {target}.

dialog.title: Droppeth Item
dialog.prompt: How many items do you wish to droppeth?

error.out-of-bounds: Couldn't create a token at this location.
error.unknown: Something went wrong when trying to drop selected item(s).

trade.title: Trade Hero Action
trade.select: Select the character to trade with

request.title: Hero Action - Trade Request
request.flavor: The character {sender} wants to trade with {receiver}

trade.rejected: The trade between {sender} and {receiver} was rejected.

removeActions.title: Remove Hero Actions
removeActions.removed: Hero Actions were removed from selected Character(s).

error.onlyCharacter: Hero Actions is only compatible with Character actors
error.notEnoughPoint: The character doesn't have enough hero points
error.noDetails: Could not find the details for this Hero Action.
error.noAction: The character doesn't have any Hero Action.
error.mustDiscard: The character must discard {nb} actions to engage in a trade.
error.noOther: There is no other character with Hero Actions available to trade with.
error.notGM: You need to be a GM to give Hero Actions.
error.tradeError: An error occured while trying to process the trade between {sender} and {receiver}.

table.noDraw: No action could be drawn from the table.
table.notFound: No Hero Point Deck table could be found in this world.
table.noFormula: The Hero Deck table has no formula, tell your GM they messed up.
table.noFormulaCompendium: The Hero Deck table has no formula and is a compendium table.
table.drawError: An error occurred during the draw, most likely the table contains non-conform results.

sheet.noCombat: You can only enter a stance during an encounter

error.noCombat: This character isn't part of an encounter.

master.label: Master
master.hint: Select a master with whom this actor will share data.
master.disabled: This actor cannot have a master

health.label: Health Pool
health.hint: Share health & stamina points with its master.

turn.label: Time Events
turn.hint: Whenever the master's turn starts/ends, initiative changes or rest for the night, the events will also be triggered for this actor.

weapon.label: Weapon Runes
weapon.hint: Use the master's invested handwraps/weapon fundamental & property runes.

armor.label: Armor Runes
armor.hint: Use the master's invested armor/bracers potency & resilient runes.

reroll.title: Save Check Reroll
reroll.noPoints: You need at least 1 Hero Point to Reroll.

drop.unauth: You can only do that on messages you are the author of.
drop.already: This message already has a save check linked to it.
drop.added: You have successfully added a save to the message.

mergeDamage.injected: Damage was injected into this message
mergeDamage.noMatch: Couldn't find another matching damage message.

infiniteAll.label: Infinite Stocks
infiniteAll.tooltip: The merchant will never run out of items to sell (does nothing to Treasures)

servicesRatio.label: Services Ratio
servicesRatio.tooltip: Price ratio for all the services on this merchant

browserPull.title: Add Items - {name}
browserPull.wait: Please wait for the items to be processed.
browserPull.finished: Items have finished being added to the merchant actor.
browserPull.owned: This item is already in the merchant's inventory
browserPull.confirm:
Are you sure you want to add the item(s) (selected: {nb}) to the merchant?

The process can take several seconds depending on the amount of items.

browserFilter.empty: No point on creating a filter without .. filters.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.tooltip: Enable the filter for this merchant

useDefault.label: Use Default Purse
useDefault.tooltip: Should this filter also use the default purse, if not, only the purse of this filter will be used

ratio.label: Price Ratio
ratio.treasure: Treasures reaching this filter will always be bought for 100% of their price

tooltip.buy:
Amount of gold to be spent on this filter (0 = no more money to buy, empty = infinite)
Note: Will not display anything smaller than gold but still keep track of it
tooltip.sell: The amount of gold this filter has received selling items so far

delete.title: Delete Filter
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete the {name} filter?

service.title: Service - {name}
service.name: Name

delete.title: Delete Service
delete.msg: Are you sure you want to delete this Service?

service.give: {seller} offers their services to {buyer} free of charge.
service.noBuyer: You must select one Character/NPC/Party you own as the target of the service.
service.noFunds: {buyer} doesn't have the funds to hire the services of {seller}.
service.error: An error occured while trying to process the service request

service-export.title: Export Services - {name}
service-export.copied: Service {name} has been copied to clipboard.
service-export.copiedAll: {name} services have been copied to clipboard.

service-import.title: Import Services - {name}
service-import.error: An error occured while trying to import the services.

buy.error: An error occured while trying to process a trade request from {user}.
buy.question: How many items do you wish to sell?

itemSheet.label: Macro
itemSheet.hint: or a macro that will be executed when this action is used

macro-zone.label: Macro
macro-zone.hint: A macro that will be executed when this {type} is used

actionable.cancelSpell: {name} cast was cancelled by its macro.

failed.daily: Has failed to identify this item today
failed.delay:
Has failed to identify this item:
{hours}h remaining

known.recall:
Can spend a single Recall Knowledge action
and automatically succeed

auto.label: Auto
auto.title: Automatic Identification
auto.content:
Identify the items that are already known by the members of the party:
    {items}
auto.none: There are no items to automatically identify

save.label: Update
save.tooltip: Update current changes and identify items
save.title: Update Changes
save.content:
Save the current changes and automatically identify the following item(s):
    {items}

request.sent: An item identification request has been sent to the GM.
